org.js4ms.amt.message

Class GroupMembershipRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.js4ms.amt.message.GroupMembershipRecord

  • public final class GroupMembershipRecord
extends Object
    Describes the current reception state, or a change in reception state for a single multicast group address. This class is used to provide a protocol-independent representation of an IGMPv3 or MLDv2 group record.
    Author:
    Greg Bumgardner (gbumgard)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GroupMembershipRecord.Type
      Enumeration of group record types.

      Constructs an instance for the specified group.

      Gets the multicast group address.

      Gets the group record type.

      Gets an Iterator for the source address HashSet.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GroupMembershipRecord

        public GroupMembershipRecord(InetAddress group,
                     GroupMembershipRecord.Type recordType,
                     HashSet<InetAddress> sourceSet)
        Constructs an instance for the specified group.
        Parameters:
        group - A multicast group address.
        recordType - An enumerator describing the state or state change for the group.
        sourceSet - - The sources to list in the record - set is stored by reference, not copied.

    • Method Detail

      • getGroup

        public InetAddress getGroup()
        Gets the multicast group address.
        Returns:
        An InetAddress (IPv4 or IPv6) object containing the group address.

      • getRecordType

        public GroupMembershipRecord.Type getRecordType()
        Gets the group record type.
        Returns:
        A Type enumerator describing the record type.

      • getSources

        public HashSet<InetAddress> getSources()
        Gets the HashSet containing the source addresses that describe the current include/exclude state or are used to describe a state change.
        Returns:
        The HashSet originally provided when the record was constructed.

      • getSourceIterator

        public Iterator<InetAddress> getSourceIterator()
        Gets an Iterator for the source address HashSet.
        Returns:
        An Iterator that can be used to iterator over the set of source addresses.
